reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 810: DESIGNATION OF PROVINCIAL EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS

content.content:
1. The following provincial education institutions are designated as provincial education institutions for the purposes of subsection 323 (5) of the Act:  Institution   Location 

  1.   Amethyst School   City of London 

  2.   Centralia College of Agricultural Technology   Township of Stephen 

  3.   Centre Jules-Léger   City of Ottawa 

  4.   Kemptville College of Agricultural Technology   Township of Oxford on Rideau 

  5.   New Liskeard College of Agricultural Technology   Town of New Liskeard 

  6.   Ridgetown College of Agricultural Technology   Town of Ridgetown 

  7.   Sagonaska School   City of Belleville 

  8.   The Ernest C. Drury School   Town of Milton 

  9.   The Robarts School   City of London 

  10.   The Sir James Whitney School   City of Belleville 

  11.   The W. Ross Macdonald School   City of Brantford 

  12.   Trillium School   Town of Milton R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 810, s. 1; O. Reg. 78/08, s. 1.  Français
